data.name: MushrooMonster
data.detailed_description:
MushrooMonster - is a first-person survival horror game.

You arrived at the forest island tonight to fight the evil mushroom monster.
There is only one way to kill the monster - that is to collect 12 mushrooms and burn them in a bonfire. But it will not be easy to do this, because the more mushrooms you collect, the more often the monster will attack you.

Some types of the mushrooms will help you survive:

Green mushrooms - Throw them at the monster to stop his attacks.
Red mushrooms - Eat them to speed up yourself and to better see mushrooms.

But remember that the amount of these mushrooms is limited.

Features:

•Randomized enemy AI
•A lot of running and screaming

data.short_description: MushrooMonster is a first-person survival horror game. You arrived at the forest island tonight to fight the evil mushroom monster. There is only one way to kill the monster - that is to collect 12 mushrooms and burn them in a bonfire.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 710 / AMD Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
